resources.string: Please confirm you want to create this new geofence (overwrite any previous)

Looks like you haven't created a list yet!
 What are you waiting for? 
Lists are proven to be helpful.
 Click the plus sign to get started
Now that you created a list, all you need to do is add reminders to the list.\n\rClick the plus sign below to create a new reminder.
Let\'s create a new list.\r\nThe first step is to select an icon to represent the list.\r\nThe second step is to name the list
Select an icon for your list:
Click here to add starting date
Click here to add starting time
Click here to add ending date
Click here to add ending time
Tip: To see more options for each task,click the blue bar on the right. It will give you options to add a location alarm, add an event in the calendar or delete
Don\'t show me this tip again
Are you sure you want to delete this task?
